/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs lining both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a few buildings peek through the foliage, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
